StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: A goal-oriented professional with strong work-ethics and commitment to offer quality work; completed post-graduation in Data Science from IIIT, Bangalore Offering over one year of experience as a Data Analyst with Vymo Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Bangalore Proficient in tools like Python, Pyspark, SQL, Tableau Possess strong understanding about developing Machine Learning models to enrich the performance of mid and bottom quartile sales reps Accustomed with exceptional time management skills along with the skills to work under pressure; capable of managing projects independently and concluding the same within stipulated timelines An effective communicator with strong analytical skills to relate to people at any level of business and management

PositionHistory.Title: Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Key Result Areas: Developing Machine Learning model to enrich the performance of mid and bottom quartile sales reps by analyzing the behavior of the top agents and suggesting to conduct meetings & calls Built analytics to analyze the performance of suggestions by computing increase in the daily planned meetings while gaining exposure in behavior of the acceptance of suggestion and improving the intelligent suggestions Creating a predictive model that assists users to prioritize the allocated leads based on the lead's profile attributes Generated QBR to show the performance of Vymo in various Quarters for different clients in terms of adoption, lead management, activity management, user visibility and performance Assessing user app usage data and operating Rsquare as a metrics to describe the battery usage on the various independent variables considered

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 43% of this job

Degree.Comments: PG: MBA/PGDM (Other Management) from BITS, Pilani in 2018
UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computers) from Heritage Institute of Technology, Kolkata in 2015
